shapes3d.utils

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.utils.Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    Small collection of methods to create mirrored or rotated images from an original image. In all methods the original is unchanged.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static processing.core.PImage flipH(processing.core.PImage src)
      Using the provided image create a copy that is flipped along the horizontal axis.
      static processing.core.PImage flipV(processing.core.PImage src)
      Using the provided image create a copy that is flipped along the vertical axis.
      static processing.core.PImage rotateCCW(processing.core.PImage src)
      Using the provided image create a copy that is rotated left (clockwise) by 90°
      static processing.core.PImage rotateCW(processing.core.PImage src)
      Using the provided image create a copy that is rotated right (counter-clockwise) by 90°

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
